scenes.background: Monica, Bob, and you are still weighing options for the celebration.
scenes.description: Bob sighs and says, 'I'm not sure any of these ideas will work for everyone.'

options.text: Let's brainstorm more ideas to find something that suits everyone.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and encouraged collaboration, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: We could try combining elements from different ideas to make everyone happy.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and consideration by proposing a compromise, but perception and social skill were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we should just vote on the options and go with the majority.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern, showing good social skill and motivation, but empathy, perception, and self-regulation were moderate.
